TopicTitle: Stupidest thing you did all day...

Articles.Content: This is a challenge to post something you did in KSP, which in hindsight, was really quite pointless! Here\'s my entry: I got a 133 ton rocket plane airborne. (See image).

Not stupidest, just most ridiculous.

Yes, I made a mockup mecha and put it on a Mun orbit. And this was before we had the part rotation feature.
